title: My New Life, Won’t You Please Become Peaceful! - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Academy   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Awkward Protagonist   Black Belly   Brother Complex   Carefree Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Death   Dishonest Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Fujoshi   Magic   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Otome Game   Possessive Characters   Reincarnated in a Game World   Sibling's Care   Sister Complex   Twisted Personality   Unreliable Narrator   Younger Brothers   Younger Sisters

description: I was reborn in another dimension where magic, princesses, princes, dragons and wizards exist. Everything is fine except for one thing: the world I was reborn in was a BL Game! There is only one choice: to become a man among men or a man under men. God….I want to die again.>
